&ldquo;A different language is a differe: “Rozdielny jazyk je rozdielny pohľad na život.”
elementary OS is created and used by peo: elementary OS je vytvorený a používaný ľuďmi z celého sveta; pomôžte nám zlepšiť zážitok prekladaním do viacerých jazykov.
elementary OS uses an open, collaborativ: elementary OS používa otvorený, spolu-vyvíjajúci nástoj na preklady v Launchpade nazývaný Rosetta.
Our website is also openly translated us: Náš web je taktiež otvorený k prekladom na online platforme zvanej Transifex.
&ldquo;Websites should look good from th: “Weby by mali vyzerať dobre z vnútra a aj z vonka”
Our website is built using HTML, CSS, PH: Náš web je napísaný pomocou HTML, CSS, PHP a JavaScript. Neustále hľadáme skúsených ľudí v tejto oblasti, ktorí by radi prispeli a urobili ho ešte lepším. Väčšina dizajnových prác je spravená naším dizajnérskym tímom, ale máme radi nápady o dizajne a feedbacky pre webový tím.
&ldquo;Great design is making something: “Skvelý dizajn vytvára niečo zapamätelné a zmysluplné.”
Every project begins with an idea. Our D: Každý projekt začína nejakou myšlienkou. Náš tím dizajnérov ju zoberie a premení na road mapy. Rozdelujeme dizajn na tieto dva komponenty:
A great place for visual designers to ge: Skvelý spôsob na začatie pre vizuálnych dizajnérov je zdieľanie návrhov v našej Google+ Community
We use a system on Launchpad called Blue: We use a system on Launchpad called Blueprints to create detailed explanations of new features.
&ldquo;Before software can be reusable i: “Before software can be reusable it first has to be usable”
Our desktop environment and all its apps: Our desktop environment and all its apps are built using Vala, GTK+, Clutter, Cairo, Granite and a number of other free libraries. All of our code is hosted on Launchpad.net, a free service for open source projects. We're always looking for contributors of all skill levels.
&ldquo;Do what you love and the money wi: “Do what you love and the money will follow.”
BountySource puts funds directly in the: BountySource puts funds directly in the hands of developers by rewarding them for committing fixes or creating new features. Set a bounty on the issues that matter to you most or fund a specific app. You can also set up a recurring subscription.
Patreon works like an ongoing crowdfundi: Patreon works like an ongoing crowdfunding campaign. Choose an amount, get rewards, and help us reach our goals.
PayPal is a quick and easy solution. Cho: PayPal is a quick and easy solution. Choose a one-time amount or set up a subscription.
